evidence.text: violated the constitutional right to family integrity of the persons subject to the policy, including Plaintiffs. 53 See Ms. L. v. U.S. Immigration and Customs Enf't, 302 F. Supp. 3d 1149, 1161-67 (S.D. Cal. 2018) (finding that plaintiffs had stated a legally cognizable claim for violations of their substantive due process rights under the Fifth Amendment to the United States Constitution based on their allegations that the government had separated them from their minor children...
